channel.title: Changing NPC HP and Hit rate
channel.description: I just added goblins (100) and they have too much HP and they hit 28's. Is there any ways to change this?

item.title: Changing NPC HP and Hit rate
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

To change the max hit g to NPCHandler.java

search for

if (GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 1)

below a few lines you may see something like:

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 21) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 451; // Hero attack hitDiff = 4 + misc.random(9);

Copy and paste that and edit it. The 4 is its lowest hit, and 13 is its highest, because 4 + 9 = 13

Read full topic
item.source: Changing NPC HP and Hit rate

item.title: Changing NPC HP and Hit rate
item.dc:creator: @spon80 spon80
item.description:
@spon80 wrote:

you also cannot change combat levels server side. you need a client to change their combat level. but you can change the hp in your npc.cfg

Read full topic
